content: From a young age, I have been fascinated by technology and its ability to solve real-world problems. This curiosity led me to pursue a career in software and web development, where I combine creativity and technical expertise to build meaningful digital solutions. Over the years, I have grown from developing console applications to crafting dynamic, user-focused websites. I take pride in my ability to adapt to new challenges, continuously learn, and stay ahead of industry trends. My ultimate goal is to create impactful projects that not only meet client needs but also inspire and engage users. Outside of coding, I enjoy exploring video editing and staying active in the tech community.
